trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter for a property representing the field name of a bound column field in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中繫結資料行欄位名稱之屬性的型別轉換子 (Type Converter)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> class to convert object types before assignment to a control property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>之前指派的物件類型轉換的控制項屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> class supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>類別支援轉換字串物件型別，而且提供的標準值指派給相關聯的控制項屬性的清單。

trans-unit.source: The standard values collection is the list of field names for bound column fields for the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 標準值集合是目前的繫結資料行欄位的欄位名稱清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To support converting additional object types, derive a class from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods for the additional object types.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援轉換其他物件的型別，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>並覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法的其他物件類型。

trans-unit.source: To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援自訂的標準可指派的值清單，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute to specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> class as the type converter for a control property.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性來指定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>的控制項屬性的類型轉換器的類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control specifies <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> as its type converter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項指定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>做為其型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法表示這個轉換子，支援傳回一份可用的值，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法表示清單是不可能的值的獨占清單。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的來源型別。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的來源型別是否可以轉換為相關聯控制項屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換器可以執行轉換，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method supports converting the source type.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法，以判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法支援轉換的來源類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method can convert only from a string, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法可以只將字串轉換，所以<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法會傳回`true`時`sourceType`是字串。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that can be used to support localization features.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，可用於支援當地語系化功能。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 將指定物件轉換成關聯控制項屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance that represents the converted object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 執行個體，表示轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是字串，則字串表示法`value`傳回。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是`null`，空字串 ("") 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: For all other values, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如需所有其他值，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method supports converting the source type.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法，以判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法支援轉換的來源類型。

trans-unit.source: The conversion could not be performed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可指派給關聯控制項屬性之可用數值的清單。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> instance containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> 執行個體，包含可用於指派給相關聯控制項屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A> property of the specified `context` object to obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A>屬性指定的`context`物件取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>實作。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> implementation is available, it is used to access the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> component.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>實作使用，它用來存取關聯的控制項設計階段並擷取可用值的清單，從相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>元件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of available values is built from the bound column fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立可用值的集合中的繫結資料行欄位從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The bound column fields consist of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection, and from the bound column fields automatically generated for fields in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 繫結資料行欄位組成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合中，針對資料來源中欄位自動產生的繫結資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 指出這個轉換子是否傳回包含所有可能數值的清單，而該數值可以指派給關聯控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換子傳回包含所有可能數值的清單，而這些數值可以指派給關聯控制項屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> instance returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>執行個體會傳回`false`，傳回的清單，表示<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法不是所有可能的指派值的獨占清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property, within the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 指出這個轉換子是否傳回一組可用值，以指派給指定內容 (Context) 內的控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換子傳回一組標準可用值，以指派給關聯的控制項屬性則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法表示這個轉換子是否支援傳回一份可用的值，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter> object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> implementation in its <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter>物件會傳回`true`如果指定`context`物件提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>中的實作其<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> implementation to access the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available bound column fields from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataColumnSelectionConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>實作，以存取相關聯的控制項設計階段並擷取可用的繫結從相關聯的資料行欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>元件。
